item.Q:
Write the character:
day; sun; date; day of the month; abbr. for Japan
item.A:
rì
日本 Rìběn Japan; Japanese

item.Q:
Write the character:
dialect; language; spoken words; speech; talk; words; conversation; what sb said
item.A:
traditional: 話
huà
的话 (的話) dehuà if

item.Q:
Write the character:
to use; to act; to move; to change
item.A:
traditional: 動
dòng
运动 (運動) yùndòng movement; campaign; sports

item.Q:
Write the character:
to beat; to strike; to hit; to break; to type; to mix up; to build; to fight; to fetch; to make; to tie up; to issue; to shoot; to calculate; since; from
item.A:
dǎ
打击 (打擊) dǎjī to hit; to strike; to attack

item.Q:
Write the character:
dragon; imperial; surname
item.A:
龙 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 龍
lóng
黑龙江 (黑龍江) Hēilóngjiāng Heilongjiang province (Heilungkiang) in northeast China, abbr. 黑, capital Harbin 哈尔滨; river forming the border between NE China and Russia (Amur)

item.Q:
Write the character:
to receive; to answer (the phone); to meet or welcome sb; to connect; to catch; to join; to extend; to take one's turn on duty; take over for sb
item.A:
jiē
直接 zhíjiē direct (opposite of indirect); immediate; directly; straightforward

item.Q:
Write the character:
to live; alive; living; work; workmanship
item.A:
huó
生活 shēnghuó life; activity; to live

item.Q:
Write the character:
merit; achievement; result; service; accomplishment; work (phys.)
item.A:
gōng
成功 chénggōng success; to succeed

item.Q:
Write the character:
flat; level; equal; to tie (make the same score); to draw (score); calm; peaceful; level or even tone (i.e. first and second tones in classical Chinese); surname
item.A:
píng
和平 hépíng peace

item.Q:
Write the character:
advantage; benefit; profit; sharp
item.A:
lì
胜利 (勝利) shènglì victory
